nodes.text: A facial transformation program altered the facial bone and muscle structure of an individual to transform their physical appearance into that of another person. Obi-Wan Kenobi utilized the program in order to disguise himself as the bounty hunter Rako Hardeen, under orders from the Jedi High Council. When disguised as Hardeen, Kenobi was able to thwart Count Dooku's plan to kidnap the Supreme Chancellor.
